# Example

## `sh` code block

In \[1\]:

``` sh
echo 'hello world!'
echo 'goodbye world!' >&2
```

Out \[1\]:

``` text
hello world!
```

Err \[1\]:

``` text
goodbye world!
```

## `console` code block

Out \[2\]:

``` console
$ echo 'hello world!'
hello world!
$ echo 'goodbye world!' >&2
goodbye world!
```
